title: Eco Design & its importance in establishing closed loops economy in Belgium

author: Wouter Ulburghs, Public Waste Agency of Flanders (OVAM)

segmentation: Welcome and thank you for being here for this into our story about ecodesign.
I'm going to tell you about the Equalizer 22 tools we designed with overport designers.

Combination for applying equal design for designers and companies.

My former job.

You would have to make it custom made for every building.
